argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mndlrid.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | mndlrid.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | mndlrid.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_mndid | |- ( G e. Mnd -> E. y e. B A. x e. B ( ( y .+ x ) = x /\ ( x .+ y ) = x ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 2, 4 | #P_mgmlrid | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( .0. .+ X ) = X /\ ( X .+ .0. ) = X ) ) |
